Control Name: 5.12.8 Direct access to the infrastructure through Azure Portal, command-line Interface (CLI) or REST API is limited and CI/CD is preferred.
Control Statement: While it is recommended to deploy application infrastructure via automation and CI/CD. To maximize application autonomy and agility, restrictive access control need be balanced on less critical development and test environments.
